metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
What if my organization isn’t prepared to set up certificate-based signatures?
Security tab of the Adobe PDFMaker preferences

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool 
to fill in flat forms. Interactive form 
To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool. See Create a form from an existing 
document.

Not all forms are fillable. Or, they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand 
or with the Fill & Sign tool. Fill in interactive forms 
An interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in.

Set privileges and permissions for others 
• Certify a document while leaving portions of it available for form filling, signatures, or 
comments 
• Use Acrobat Pro software to enable users of Reader 9 or later to sign with certificate 
IDs 
• Use Acrobat Standard or Pro to encrypt a PDF document with a certificate ID to restrict 
usage such as printing, editing, or copying 
 
What if my organization isn’t prepared to set up certificate-
based signatures? Consider signing up for Adobe Acrobat Sign online, the leader in e-signatures and web 
contracting. Managing Digital IDs: Help pages for digital ID management.

• Flat forms: These do not have interactive fields. You can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signatures. You can now fill in the form fields and sign the 
form using the sign tools described in the following topics.

Fill and Sign PDF Forms 
You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types 
of PDF forms

PDF/A Compliance 
Creates the PDF so that it conforms to the selected ISO standard for long-term preservation of 
electronic documents. Require A Password To Open The Document 
When selected, makes the Document Open Password option available, where you enter a 
password that users must use to open the document. Restrict Editing And Printing Of The Document 
When selected, makes the other Permissions options available.
